programme.title: A state of mind
programme.desc: Ford's Raptor T1+ is pitted against other top vehicles in the T1+ category at the gruelling Rallye du Maroc.

programme.title: Building a beast
programme.desc: Discover the process to build the ultimate Raptor, from CAD designs to making its first tracks in the wild.

programme.title: Into the dunes
programme.desc: The Ford Performance team pushes the Raptor T1+ and its driver to their limits to prepare for the Dakar Rally.

programme.title: Into the wild
programme.desc: Join Dakar Rally legend Carlos Sainz Snr behind the wheel of Ford Performance's Raptor T1+.

programme.title: Kai Jones' Falling into Place
programme.desc: After a cliff fall shattered his legs, Kai Jones faces a harrowing rescue, surgery and fight for survival.

programme.title: Abstract
programme.desc: Faction's fourth feature film exhibits pure creativity through a series of high-octane freeski sequences.

programme.title: Anna Gasser – The Spark Within
programme.desc: Follow snowboard superstar Anna Gasser over a decade to see how she changed the snowboarding landscape.

programme.title: Anywhere from Here
programme.desc: Just 11-years-old and already a freestyle ski phenomenon. Meet the extraordinary Walker Woodring.

programme.title: Layers
programme.desc: Discover and celebrate the unique people, places, personalities and layers behind what we call snowboarding.

programme.title: Anton Palzer: Breaking the Cycle
programme.desc: From the powder to the pavement – Anton Palzer believes he has what it takes to switch from ski mountaineer to road cyclist.

programme.title: Flying Between Giants
programme.desc: Paraglider pilots Tom de Dorlodot and Horacio Llorens flew past four of Pakistan's peaks in just one day.

programme.title: The end game
programme.desc: Follow Julian Wilson and Jordy Smith as they look to win more than just the prestigious Pipe Masters trophy.

programme.title: The final preparation
programme.desc: As the 2018 season draws to an end, the athletes spend time with family before the final events of the year.

programme.title: Women’s world title
programme.desc: The WSL Championship Tour has made it to Hawaii for the final two events of the season.

programme.title: Au Revoir
programme.desc: The story of wakeboarding champion Raph Derome as he retires from riding in front of crowds and cameras.

programme.title: Plus 27
programme.desc: Jordy Smith shares his journey and the profound impact his homeland has had on his life and surfing career.

programme.title: ANYTIME
programme.desc: Follow a new generation of mountain bikers conquering extreme terrain in ANYTIME.

programme.title: Jaan Roose: Life on the Line
programme.desc: Slackliner Jaan Roose reflects on life as he plans a world record tightrope walk across the Strait of Messina.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Map the extraordinary rise of Mondo Duplantis from backyard dreamer to global pole vault sensation.

programme.title: Yeah buddy – part 1
programme.desc: Aussie climbing prodigy Angie Scarth-Johnson and Hazel Findlay explore Mallorca’s deep-water soloing routes.

programme.title: Yeah buddy – part 2
programme.desc: Angie Scarth-Johnson faces the mental challenge of climbing comp Psicobloc, overcoming fears of deep waters.

programme.title: Soundscape
programme.desc: Blind adventure athlete and author Erik Weihenmayer ascends a massive rock face deep in the Sierra Nevada.

programme.title: With my heart
programme.desc: Climbing legend Sachi Amma shifts from world champ to purist, ending with a bold first ascent on Mt. Mizugaki.

programme.title: Black Pearl
programme.desc: At 42, Chris Sharma conquers Black Pearl in Mallorca – his toughest deep water solo climb yet.

programme.title: The puzzle
programme.desc: Brette Harrington climbs the Chinese Puzzle Wall, completing a route begun by her late partner, Marc-André.
